entity.name: activity_transaction
entity.query: SELECT iati_activity.iati_identifier as iati_identifier, iati_transaction.id AS id, activity_id, ref, CASE WHEN iati_transaction.humanitarian=TRUE THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS humanitarian, CASE WHEN iati_activity.humanitarian=TRUE THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS activity_humanitarian, transaction_type_id, TO_CHAR(transaction_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS transaction_date, currency_id, TO_CHAR(value_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS value_date, value, disbursement_channel_id, tied_status_id, flow_type_id FROM iati_transaction, iati_activity WHERE activity_id=iati_activity.id ORDER BY iati_transaction.id
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT iati_transaction.id AS id FROM iati_transaction, iati_activity WHERE activity_id = iati_activity.id AND iati_activity.last_updated_model > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' ORDER BY iati_transaction.id
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT iati_activity.iati_identifier as iati_identifier, iati_transaction.id AS id, activity_id, ref, CASE WHEN iati_transaction.humanitarian=TRUE THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS humanitarian, CASE WHEN iati_activity.humanitarian=TRUE THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS activity_humanitarian, transaction_type_id, TO_CHAR(transaction_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS transaction_date, currency_id, TO_CHAR(value_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS value_date, value, disbursement_channel_id, tied_status_id, flow_type_id FROM iati_transaction, iati_activity WHERE activity_id=iati_activity.id AND iati_transaction.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'

entity.name: activity_title_narrative
entity.query: SELECT language_id AS lang, iati_narrative.content AS content FROM iati_narrative, django_content_type WHERE iati_narrative.related_object_id=${activity_title.id} AND iati_narrative.activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id} AND django_content_type.model='title' AND django_content_type.id=iati_narrative.related_content_type_id

entity.name: activity_description
entity.query: SELECT id, type_id AS type FROM iati_description WHERE activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id}

entity.name: activity_description_narrative
entity.query: SELECT language_id AS lang, content AS narrative FROM iati_narrative, django_content_type WHERE iati_narrative.related_object_id=${activity_description.id} AND iati_narrative.activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id} AND django_content_type.model='description' AND django_content_type.id=iati_narrative.related_content_type_id

entity.name: activity_activity_date
entity.query: SELECT type_id, TO_CHAR(iso_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS iso_date FROM iati_activitydate WHERE activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id}

entity.name: activity_reporting_org
entity.query: SELECT organisation_id, ref FROM iati_activityreportingorganisation WHERE activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id} LIMIT 1

entity.name: activity_transaction_sector
entity.query: SELECT sector_id, vocabulary_id, vocabulary_uri FROM iati_transactionsector WHERE transaction_id=${activity_transaction.id}

entity.name: activity_transaction_provider_org
entity.query: SELECT id, provider_activity_ref, type_id, ref FROM iati_transactionprovider WHERE transaction_id=${activity_transaction.id}

entity.name: aactivity_transaction_provider_org_narrative
entity.query: SELECT iati_narrative.related_object_id AS related_object_id, iati_narrative.content AS content FROM iati_narrative, django_content_type WHERE iati_narrative.related_object_id=${activity_transaction_provider_org.id} AND iati_narrative.activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id} AND django_content_type.model='transactionprovider' AND django_content_type.id=iati_narrative.related_content_type_id LIMIT 1

entity.name: activity_transaction_receiver_org

entity.name: activity_transaction_receiver_org_narrative
entity.query: SELECT iati_narrative.related_object_id AS related_object_id, iati_narrative.content AS content FROM iati_narrative, django_content_type WHERE iati_narrative.related_object_id=${activity_transaction_receiver_org.id} AND iati_narrative.activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id} AND django_content_type.model='transactionreceiver' AND django_content_type.id=iati_narrative.related_content_type_id

entity.name: activity_transaction_recipient_country
entity.query: SELECT country_id FROM iati_transactionrecipientcountry WHERE transaction_id=${activity_transaction.id} LIMIT 1

entity.name: activity_transaction_recipient_region
entity.query: SELECT region_id, vocabulary_id FROM iati_transactionrecipientregion WHERE transaction_id=${activity_transaction.id} LIMIT 1

entity.name: activity_transaction_aid_type
entity.query: SELECT aid_type_id FROM iati_transactionaidtype WHERE transaction_id=${activity_transaction.id}

entity.name: activity_sector
entity.query: SELECT id, vocabulary_id, vocabulary_uri, sector_id, percentage, CAST(( SELECT ROW_TO_JSON(sector_record) AS sector FROM ( SELECT vocabulary_id AS vocabulary, vocabulary_uri AS vocabulary_uri, sector_id AS code, percentage AS percentage, JSON_AGG(ROW_TO_JSON(narrative_record)) AS narrative FROM ( SELECT language_id AS lang, content AS text FROM iati_narrative, django_content_type WHERE related_object_id = iati_activitysector.id AND django_content_type.model = 'activitysector' AND related_content_type_id = django_content_type.id ) as narrative_record ) AS sector_record ) AS VARCHAR) FROM iati_activitysector WHERE activity_id=${activity_transaction.activity_id}
